Sinopse: Perfect boyfriend Milan encourages Mika to go investigate he roots of her beloved mount Windstorm, all the way to his breed's homeland Andalusia, in southern Spain, where their ancestors got paired. Penniless, she's engaged with board at a stud-farm run by a local family lodging more horse-fanatical youngsters. By the time Sam arrives, they've joined the fight against the local development plan that would wreck the habitat of the last wild horses, but still need to raise money to keep the stud farm running, by winning a traditional competition, staging an extraordinary event in record speed.—KGF Vissers
